Package metro.GameScreen

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameScreen
    Every Menu or Game Sreen has to implement this interface for start() and update().
    MainMenu
    The main menu is the first menu you'll see after starting the game.
    Toolbar
    This is the bar on the side with the "build station", "build tracks", "show line view" and "create train" buttons.
